00116 int lnp_handle_public_key_request(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00117         lnp_public_key_request_p public_key_request;
00118         int routing_entry_index;
00119         int store_entry_index;
00120 
00121         if (parse_public_key_request(&public_key_request,
00122                         packet->content, content_length) == LNP_ERROR) {
00123                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet format corrupted.");    
00124                 return LNP_ERROR;
00125         } 
00126         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet successfuly parsed.");  
00127         
00128         /* Verifying protocol versions. */
00129         if (verify_versions(public_key_request.major_version,
00130                         public_key_request.minor_version) == LNP_ERROR) {
00131                 return LNP_ERROR;
00132         }
00133         
00134         /* lock routing entry */
00135         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(packet->source);
00136         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00137                 //TODO
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00141                 store_entry_index = lnp_key_store_new();
00142                 routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index = store_entry_index;
00143         }
00144         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00145 
00146         /* unlock routing entry */
00147         /*lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);*/
00148 
00149         memcpy(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].public_key,
00150                         public_key_request.public_key, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH);
00151                         
00152         /* Generating k parameter. */
00153         if (util_rand_bytes(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00154                         == UTIL_ERROR) {
00155                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating k parameter.");
00156                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00157                 return LNP_ERROR;               
00158         };
00159         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "parameter k generated.");
00160         
00161         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state =
00162                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_BEING_CONNECTED;
00163 
00164         /* Send request packet. */
00165         if (send_public_key_response(packet->source, store_entry_index)
00166                         == LNP_ERROR) {
00167                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00168                 return LNP_ERROR;
00169         }
00170 
00171         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00172 
00173 
00174 
00175         return LNP_OK;
00176 }
00177 /******************************************************************************/
00178 int lnp_handle_public_key_response(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00179         lnp_public_key_response_p public_key_response;
00180         int routing_entry_index;
00181         int store_entry_index;
00182 
00183         /* Reading packet */
00184         if (parse_public_key_response(&public_key_response,
00185                         packet->content, content_length) == LNP_ERROR) {
00186                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet format corrupted.");    
00187                 return LNP_ERROR;
00188         } 
00189         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet successfuly parsed.");  
00190 
00191         /* lock routing entry */
00192         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(packet->source);
00193         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00194                 //TODO
00195         }
00196 
00197         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00198         
00199         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state !=
00200                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTING) {
00201                 liblog_info(LAYER_NET, "public_key_response dropped: "
00202                                 "state must be LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTING.");
00203                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00204                 return LNP_ERROR;
00205         }
00206         
00207         /* Generating k parameter. */
00208         if (util_rand_bytes(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00209                         == UTIL_ERROR) {
00210                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating k parameter.");
00211                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00212                 return LNP_ERROR;               
00213         };
00214         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "parameter k generated.");
00215 
00216         memcpy(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].public_key,
00217                         public_key_response.public_key, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH); 
00218         //TODO cifrar
00219         memcpy(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_in,
00220                         public_key_response.encrypted_k, LNP_K_LENGTH); 
00221                         
00222         /* Send key exchange packet. */
00223         if (send_key_exchange(packet->source, store_entry_index) == LNP_ERROR) {
00224                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00225                 return LNP_ERROR;
00226         }
00227 
00228         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state =
00229                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_EXCHANGING_KEYS;
00230 
00231         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00232 
00233         return LNP_OK;
00234 }
00235 /******************************************************************************/
00236 int lnp_handle_key_exchange(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00237         lnp_key_exchange_p key_exchange;
00238         int routing_entry_index;
00239         int store_entry_index;
00240         
00241         /* Reading packet */
00242         if (parse_key_exchange(&key_exchange,
00243                         packet->content, content_length) == LNP_ERROR) {
00244                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet format corrupted.");    
00245                 return LNP_ERROR;
00246         } 
00247         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet successfuly parsed.");  
00248         
00249         /* lock routing entry */
00250         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(packet->source);
00251         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00252                 //TODO
00253         }
00254 
00255         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00256         
00257         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state !=
00258                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_BEING_CONNECTED) {
00259                 liblog_info(LAYER_NET, "public_key_exchange dropped: "
00260                                 "state must be LNP_HANDSHAKE_BEING_CONNECTED.");
00261                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00262                 return LNP_ERROR;
00263         }
00264         
00265         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher = 
00266                         lnp_cipher_search(key_exchange.ciphers);
00267         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].hash =
00268                         lnp_hash_search(key_exchange.hashes);
00269         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac =
00270                         lnp_mac_search(key_exchange.macs);
00271                         
00272         /* Functions received don't support even the defaults. */
00273         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher == NULL ||
00274                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].hash == NULL ||
00275                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac == NULL) {
00276                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET,
00277                                 "received functions not supported, packet dropped.");
00278                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00279                 return LNP_ERROR;
00280         }
00281         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "received functions are supported.");
00282         
00283         // TODO decifrar
00284         if (memcmp(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out,
00285                         key_exchange.encrypted_k_1, LNP_K_LENGTH) != 0) {
00286                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00287                 return LNP_ERROR;
00288         }
00289         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "parameter k authenticated.");
00290         
00291         // TODO decifrar
00292         memcpy(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_in,
00293                         key_exchange.encrypted_k_2, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00294 
00295         /* Create all the keys. */
00296         if (create_keys(store_entry_index) == LNP_ERROR) {
00297                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating session keys.");
00298                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00299                 return LNP_ERROR;                                               
00300         };
00301         
00302         if (send_key_exchange_ok(packet->source, store_entry_index) == LNP_ERROR) {
00303                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00304                 return LNP_ERROR;
00305         }
00306         
00307         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state =
00308                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTED;
00309         
00310         /*pthread_cond_broadcast(
00311                         &lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_condition);*/
00312         /*lnp_routing_entry_signal(routing_entry_index);*/
00313 
00314         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00315 
00316         return LNP_OK;
00317 }
00318 /******************************************************************************/
00319 int lnp_handle_key_exchange_ok(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00320         lnp_key_exchange_ok_p key_exchange_ok;
00321         int routing_entry_index;
00322         int store_entry_index;
00323         
00324         /* Reading packet */
00325         if (parse_key_exchange_ok(&key_exchange_ok,
00326                         packet->content, content_length) == LNP_ERROR) {
00327                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet format corrupted.");    
00328                 return LNP_ERROR;
00329         } 
00330         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet successfuly parsed.");  
00331         
00332         /* lock routing entry */
00333         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(packet->source);
00334         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00335                 //TODO
00336         }
00337 
00338         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00339         
00340         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state !=
00341                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_EXCHANGING_KEYS) {
00342                 liblog_info(LAYER_NET, "public_key_exchange_ok dropped: "
00343                                 "state must be LNP_HANDSHAKE_EXCHANGING_KEYS.");
00344                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00345                 return LNP_ERROR;
00346         }
00347         
00348         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher = 
00349                         lnp_cipher_search(key_exchange_ok.cipher);
00350         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].hash =
00351                         lnp_hash_search(key_exchange_ok.hash);
00352         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac =
00353                         lnp_mac_search(key_exchange_ok.mac);
00354                         
00355         /* Functions received don't support even the defaults. */
00356         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher == NULL ||
00357                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].hash == NULL ||
00358                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac == NULL) {
00359                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET,
00360                                 "received functions not supported, packet dropped.");
00361                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00362                 return LNP_ERROR;
00363         }
00364         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "received functions are supported.");
00365         
00366         // TODO decifrar
00367         if (memcmp(lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out,
00368                         key_exchange_ok.encrypted_k, LNP_K_LENGTH) != 0) {
00369                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00370                 return LNP_ERROR;
00371         }
00372         
00373         /* Create all the keys. */
00374         if (create_keys(store_entry_index) == LNP_ERROR) {
00375                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating keys.");
00376                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00377                 return LNP_ERROR;                                               
00378         };
00379         
00380         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state =
00381                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTED;
00382 
00383         lnp_routing_entry_signal(routing_entry_index);
00384 
00385         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00386 
00387         return LNP_OK;
00388 
00389 }
00390 /******************************************************************************/
00391 int lnp_connect(net_id_t id) {
00392         int routing_entry_index;
00393         int store_entry_index;
00394         int return_value;
00395         u_char transmission_mode;
00396         
00397         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id);
00398         transmission_mode = LNP_BROADCAST;
00399         if (routing_entry_index != LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00400                 transmission_mode = LNP_UNICAST;
00401         } else {
00402                 lnp_add_id(id);
00403                 routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id);
00404                 if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00405                         return LNP_ERROR;
00406                 }
00407         }
00408         
00409         if (routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00410                 store_entry_index = lnp_key_store_new();
00411                 routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index = store_entry_index;
00412         }
00413         
00414         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00415         
00416         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state = LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTING;
00417                         
00418         if (send_public_key_request(id, transmission_mode)
00419                         == LNP_ERROR) {
00420                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00421                 return LNP_ERROR;
00422         }
00423         
00424         lnp_routing_entry_condwait(routing_entry_index, 
00425                         (LNP_TIME_TICK*LNP_T_HANDSHAKE));
00426         
00427         return_value = (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state ==
00428                         LNP_HANDSHAKE_CONNECTED ? LNP_OK : LNP_ERROR);
00429         if (return_value == LNP_ERROR) {
00430                 lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].handshake_state = LNP_HANDSHAKE_CLOSED;                
00431         }
00432         
00433         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00434                 
00435         return return_value;
00436 }
00437 
00438 /*============================================================================*/
00439 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00440 /*============================================================================*/
00441 
00442 int create_keys(int index) {
00443         u_char *cipher_key;
00444         u_char *cipher_iv;
00445         u_char *mac_key;
00446         u_char k_in[2 * LNP_K_LENGTH];
00447         u_char k_out[2 * LNP_K_LENGTH];
00448         u_char public_key[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH];
00449         int public_key_length;
00450         
00451         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "generating session keys.");
00452         
00453         public_key_length =
00454                         lnp_get_public_key(public_key, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH);
00455 
00456         /* Allocating memory for temporary key containers. */
00457         //TODO pegar do store
00458         cipher_key = (u_char *)malloc(lnp_key_store[index].cipher->key_length);
00459         cipher_iv = (u_char *)malloc(lnp_key_store[index].cipher->iv_length);
00460         mac_key = (u_char *)malloc(lnp_key_store[index].mac->key_length);
00461         if (cipher_key == NULL || cipher_iv == NULL || mac_key == NULL) {
00462                 free(cipher_key);
00463                 free(cipher_iv);
00464                 free(mac_key);
00465                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_NET, "error in malloc: %s", strerror(errno));
00466                 return LNP_ERROR;
00467         }
00468         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "memory allocated for session keys.");
00469         
00470         memcpy(k_in, lnp_key_store[index].k_in, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00471         memcpy(&k_in[LNP_K_LENGTH], lnp_key_store[index].k_out,
00472                         LNP_K_LENGTH);
00473         memcpy(k_out, lnp_key_store[index].k_out, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00474         memcpy(&k_out[LNP_K_LENGTH], lnp_key_store[index].k_in,
00475                         LNP_K_LENGTH);
00476 
00477         if (util_create_key(
00478                         cipher_key,
00479                         lnp_key_store[index].cipher->key_length,
00480                         lnp_key_store[index].public_key,
00481                         k_in,
00482                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00483                         "key",
00484                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00485                                 || lnp_set_cipher_in_key(index, cipher_key) == LNP_ERROR) {
00486                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating cipher_in_key.");
00487                 free(cipher_key);
00488                 free(cipher_iv);
00489                 free(mac_key);
00490                 return LNP_ERROR;
00491         }
00492 
00493         if (util_create_key(
00494                         cipher_key, 
00495                         lnp_key_store[index].cipher->key_length,
00496                         public_key,
00497                         k_out,
00498                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00499                         "key",
00500                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00501                                 || lnp_set_cipher_out_key(index, cipher_key) == LNP_ERROR) {
00502                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating cipher_out_key.");
00503                 free(cipher_key);
00504                 free(cipher_iv);
00505                 free(mac_key);
00506                 return LNP_ERROR;
00507         }
00508         
00509         if (util_create_key(
00510                         cipher_iv,
00511                         lnp_key_store[index].cipher->iv_length,
00512                         lnp_key_store[index].public_key,
00513                         k_in,
00514                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00515                         "iv",
00516                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00517                                 || lnp_set_cipher_in_iv(index, cipher_iv) == LNP_ERROR) {
00518                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating cipher_in_iv.");
00519                 free(cipher_key);
00520                 free(cipher_iv);
00521                 free(mac_key);
00522                 return LNP_ERROR;
00523         }
00524         
00525         if (util_create_key(
00526                         cipher_iv, 
00527                         lnp_key_store[index].cipher->iv_length,
00528                         public_key,
00529                         k_out,
00530                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00531                         "iv",
00532                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00533                                 || lnp_set_cipher_out_iv(index, cipher_iv) == LNP_ERROR) {
00534                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating cipher_out_iv.");
00535                 free(cipher_key);
00536                 free(cipher_iv);
00537                 free(mac_key);
00538                 return LNP_ERROR;
00539         }
00540 
00541         if (util_create_key(
00542                         mac_key, 
00543                         lnp_key_store[index].mac->key_length,
00544                         lnp_key_store[index].public_key,
00545                         k_in,
00546                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00547                         "mac",
00548                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00549                                 || lnp_set_mac_in_key(index, mac_key) == LNP_ERROR) {
00550                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating mac_in_key.");
00551                 free(cipher_key);
00552                 free(cipher_iv);
00553                 free(mac_key);
00554                 return LNP_ERROR;
00555         }
00556         
00557         if (util_create_key(
00558                         mac_key, 
00559                         lnp_key_store[index].mac->key_length,
00560                         public_key,
00561                         k_out,
00562                         2 * LNP_K_LENGTH,
00563                         "mac",
00564                         lnp_key_store[index].hash) == LNP_ERROR
00565                                 || lnp_set_mac_out_key(index, mac_key) == LNP_ERROR) {
00566                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating mac_out_key.");
00567                 free(cipher_key);
00568                 free(cipher_iv);
00569                 free(mac_key);
00570                 return LNP_ERROR;
00571         }
00572         
00573         liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "keys generated.");
00574 
00575         free(cipher_key);
00576         free(cipher_iv);
00577         free(mac_key);
00578         return LNP_OK;
00579 }
00580 /******************************************************************************/
00581 int verify_versions(u_char remote_major, u_char remote_minor) {
00582         /*
00583          * Boolean that controls if a log message informing about a new LNP version 
00584          * was found when a connection was being established with some host.
00585          */
00586         static int new_version_found = 0;
00587         
00588         /* Testing protocol major version implemented by remote peer. */
00589         if (remote_major != LNP_MAJOR_VERSION) {
00590                 liblog_warn(LAYER_NET,
00591                                 "incompatible protocol versions: local: %d.%d; remote: %d.%d",
00592                                 LNP_MAJOR_VERSION, LNP_MINOR_VERSION, 
00593                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00594                 if (remote_major > LNP_MAJOR_VERSION) {
00595                         liblog_info(LAYER_NET,
00596                                         "remote peer uses version %d.%d, upgrade mandatory.",
00597                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00598                                 new_version_found = 1;                  
00599                 }
00600                 return LNP_ERROR;
00601         }
00602         /* Comparing minor versions. */
00603         if (remote_minor > LNP_MINOR_VERSION && !new_version_found) {
00604                 liblog_info(LAYER_NET,
00605                                 "remote peer uses version %d.%d, upgrade recommended.",
00606                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00607                 new_version_found = 1;
00608         }
00609         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "protocol versions verified.");
00610         
00611         return LNP_OK;
00612 }
00613 /******************************************************************************/
00614 int send_public_key_request(net_id_t id, u_char mode) {
00615         int offset;
00616         u_char ttl = 0;
00617         u_char flags = 0;
00618         u_char packet[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH];
00619         u_char public_key[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH];
00620         int public_key_length;
00621                 
00622         /* Constructing public key request packet */
00623         offset = 0;
00624         public_key_length =
00625                         lnp_get_public_key(public_key, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH);
00626         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_REQUEST);
00627         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, ttl);
00628         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00629         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00630         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, flags);
00631         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_MAJOR_VERSION);
00632         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_MINOR_VERSION);
00633         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, mode);
00634         util_join_mpint (packet, &offset, public_key);
00635 
00636         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet constructed.");
00637         
00638         /* Sending packet. */
00639         if (lnp_link_write(packet, offset) == LNP_ERROR) {
00640                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error sending packet.");
00641                 return LNP_ERROR;
00642         }
00643         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet sent.");
00644         
00645         return LNP_OK;
00646 }
00647 /******************************************************************************/
00648 int send_public_key_response(net_id_t id, int store_entry_index) {
00649         int offset;
00650         u_char ttl = 0;
00651         u_char flags = 0;
00652         u_char public_key[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH];
00653         u_char packet[LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_RESPONSE_MAX_LENGTH];
00654         int public_key_length;
00655 
00656         /* Constructing public key request acknowledgement packet. */
00657         offset = 0;
00658         public_key_length = 
00659                         lnp_get_public_key(public_key, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_LENGTH);
00660         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_PUBLIC_KEY_RESPONSE);
00661         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, ttl);
00662         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00663         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00664         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, flags);
00665         util_join_mpint (packet, &offset, public_key);
00666         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out,
00667                         LNP_K_LENGTH);
00668         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet constructed.");
00669         
00670         /* Sending packet. */
00671         if (lnp_link_write(packet, offset) == LNP_ERROR) {
00672                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error sending packet.");
00673                 return LNP_ERROR;
00674         }
00675         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet sent.");
00676 
00677         return LNP_OK;
00678 }
00679 /******************************************************************************/
00680 int send_key_exchange(net_id_t id, int store_entry_index) {
00681         int offset;
00682         u_char ttl = 0;
00683         u_char flags = 0;
00684         u_char packet[LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_MAX_LENGTH];
00685         char cipher_string[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00686         char hash_string[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00687         char mac_string[LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00688         
00689         lnp_get_cipher_string(cipher_string, LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00690         lnp_get_hash_string(hash_string, LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00691         lnp_get_mac_string(mac_string, LNP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00692         
00693         /* Constructing key exchange packet. */
00694         offset = 0;
00695         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE);
00696         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, ttl);
00697         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00698         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00699         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, flags);
00700         util_join_string(packet, &offset, cipher_string);
00701         util_join_string(packet, &offset, hash_string);
00702         util_join_string(packet, &offset, mac_string);
00703         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset,
00704                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_in, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00705         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset,
00706                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_out, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00707         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet constructed.");
00708         
00709         /* Sending packet. */
00710         if (lnp_link_write(packet, offset) == LNP_ERROR) {
00711                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "error sending packet.");
00712                 return LNP_ERROR;
00713         }
00714         
00715         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet sent.");
00716 
00717         return LNP_OK;
00718 }
00719 /******************************************************************************/
00720 int send_key_exchange_ok(net_id_t id, int store_entry_index) {
00721         int offset;
00722         u_char ttl = 0;
00723         u_char flags = 0;
00724         u_char packet[LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_OK_MAX_LENGTH];
00725         
00726         /* Constructing key exchange acknowledgment packet. */
00727         offset = 0;
00728         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_KEY_EXCHANGE_OK);
00729         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, ttl);
00730         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00731         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, (u_char *)id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00732         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, flags);
00733         util_join_string(packet, &offset,
00734                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher -> name);
00735         util_join_string(packet, &offset,
00736                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].hash -> name);
00737         util_join_string(packet, &offset,
00738                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac -> name);
00739         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset,
00740                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].k_in, LNP_K_LENGTH);
00741         
00742         /* Sending packet. */
00743         if (lnp_link_write(packet, offset) == LNP_ERROR) {
00744                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "error sending packet.");
00745                 return LNP_ERROR;
00746         }
00747         
00748         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet sent.");
00749         
00750         return LNP_OK;  
00751 }
00752 /******************************************************************************/
00753 int parse_public_key_request(lnp_public_key_request_p *packet,
00754                 u_char *packet_data, int packet_size) {
00755         
00756         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_size, LNP_OK, LNP_ERROR)
00757         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->major_version)
00758         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->minor_version)
00759         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->transmission_mode)
00760         UTIL_READ_MPINT(packet->public_key)
00761         UTIL_READ_END
00762 }       
00763 /******************************************************************************/
00764 inline int parse_public_key_response(lnp_public_key_response_p *packet,
00765                 u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00766         
00767         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LNP_OK, LNP_ERROR)
00768         UTIL_READ_MPINT(packet->public_key)
00769         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->encrypted_k, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00770         UTIL_READ_END
00771 }
00772 /******************************************************************************/
00773 int parse_key_exchange(lnp_key_exchange_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00774                 int packet_length) {
00775 
00776         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LNP_OK, LNP_ERROR)
00777         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->ciphers)
00778         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->hashes)
00779         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->macs)
00780         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->encrypted_k_1, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00781         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->encrypted_k_2, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00782         UTIL_READ_END
00783 }
00784 /******************************************************************************/
00785 int parse_key_exchange_ok(lnp_key_exchange_ok_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00786                 int packet_length) {
00787         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LNP_OK, LNP_ERROR)
00788         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->cipher)
00789         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->hash)
00790         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->mac)
00791         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->encrypted_k, LNP_K_LENGTH)
00792         UTIL_READ_END
00793 }
